item.title: Israel-Iran live updates: Iran launches new strikes; Israel says it hit fuel tankers
item.description: Iran launched dozens of ballistic missiles toward Israel on Friday night in retaliation for Israel's surprise attack early Friday.

item.title: Protests live updates: 1 wounded in shooting 'possibly' connected with Utah protest
item.description: Saturday marks the first full day of Marines on duty in Los Angeles, one week after protests against Immigration and Customs Enforcement raids ignited...

item.title: WATCH: New service members sworn into US Army by Trump
item.description: President Donald Trump carried out the swearing in of 300 new U.S. service members during Saturday's Washington, D.C., military parade.

item.title: WATCH: In 1st address to US, Pope Leo XIV sends message of hope at White Sox Field
item.description: In a recorded message from the Vatican prepared exclusively for the audience at Rate Field, home of the Chicago White Sox, Pope Leo XIV delivered a me...

item.title: WATCH: US Army's Golden Knights parachute over National Mall
item.description: Parachutists with the Army's Golden Knights jumped onto the Ellipse at the Grand Military Parade in Washington, D.C.
